Posts.Title: Hip pain - any ideas?

Posts.Content: hi hun , i had the tram flap about 10 year ago and i found it the best for me. i did'nt fancy the LD flap as i thought it would be too uncomfortable having a scar on my back and front. i find the part under arm is a little numb but the rest of the bresat is fine ans if you rub plenty of cream onto the breast after it heals the scars hardley show. i had 2 drains in my chest it was a little uncomfortable untill the drains were removed but i healed very quickly and with not having a scar on my back i was able to sleep quite well whilst healing. i find the breast is a little heavier than my normal one but with a decent bra it is comfy enough. i hope this is of help to you. love doreen keep ya chin up xxx

Posts.Content: hi hun i know exactly how you feel i was called back to see dr a month ago and was told cancer has now gone down onto my liver. they cant do surgery as it is little spots all over my liver, and i was told on average with my condition i have about 2years there was noone more shocked at that time she has put me on chemo meds to keep me going as long as she can , she also said she knows of someone who went 6yrs so just gotta hope the meds will keep me going to, but the news was so terrible i did'nt know what to do and now and again i have to have a good cry im so fed up too as friends and family seem to be keeping thier distance. take care hun i hope you do relly well and my prays are with you xxxxxxxx doreen
